title: Meticulously spacious three bed home for rent
description: Stunning 3-bedroom end-unit townhome, on a quiet street near the Wissahickon/Fairmount Park trails. The long, paver driveway makes parking flexible and holds 4 cars (rare for Roxborough). The home exterior displays a beautiful mixture of local schist stone, modern aluminum facia, and is wrapped with high-end Hardie siding (for longevity).  This contemporary home offers open concept living, boasting 3 large bedrooms, and 2 baths. Upon entry into the open living room, you come across the classic hardwood flooring throughout the space, and a custom high-end fireplace. The chef’s kitchen features white shaker cabinets, complemented by a bright backsplash, and a mixture of quartz and butcher countertops. The island comes complete with a large farmhouse sink, adjacent dishwasher, and seating for quick meals or longer gatherings. Stainless steel appliances include a built-in microwave, gas range, French-door refrigerator and dishwasher. There is an adjacent pantry within arm’s length of the refrigerator. Walk through the sliding door to a full backyard deck offering plenty of privacy for intimate and large gatherings.

title: Meticulously spacious three bed home available for rent
description: Quiet pocket of Somerton, this 3 bed, 2 bath single home provides a relaxing retreat in the city limits. As you walk through the door into the foyer you're struck with an extraordinary sense of calm (check your pulse and if all's normal, continue).  To you're left (the shoe with the L) you'll see a sprawling Living Room with a beautiful wood-burning fireplace ( I suppose it could burn lots of things but that's what they call it).  There is an additional casual living room adjacent to the rear (perfect for placing argumentative relatives in different rooms during a family party to keep the peace) and access to the spacious, fenced backyard. From the formal living room there's a hallway to the kitchen BUT along the way is a good-sized laundry room (yes, I did say main floor laundry), a stairway to the finished basement AND a half bath.  Once you've tried out all of those rooms you'll make it to the kitchen.  This is one of those kitchens you can eat in, which is nice, especially if you're really hungry.  There are plenty of cabinets, stainless steel appliances, space for a large table, and access to the aforementioned spacious, fenced backyard (If your Hide & Seek rules allow you to go outside those two doors will be key, you're welcome).

title: This modern two-bedroom, two-bath condo
description:
Saint James Court offers a serene park-like setting in the heart of Society Hill. This modern two-bedroom, two-bath condo facing the interior courtyard features a dramatic Living Room with soaring ceilings and sliding glass doors opening out to a private patio garden. Having been completely renovated from its original construction you'll enjoy entertaining with a newer kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, offering a gas range, microwave oven, and refrigerator with ice and water feature on the door, granite countertops, and a spacious pantry closet. The updated bathrooms and a mezzanine office overlooking the Saint James Court, featuring a laundry closet with a full-size stackable washer and dryer and utility sink are conveniently located off the master suite. Enjoy generous closet spaces and beautiful wood floors throughout. You'll never have to walk far to enjoy historic sites, world-class museums, top-ranked restaurants, convenient supermarkets, and sports clubs. GARAGE PARKING is guaranteed at Independence Place for an additional monthly cost. This property is pet-friendly too!

title: Historic Building , Elevator Building , Close To Train
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
-Smoke-free apartments available
-Seasonal Bike Share Program
-Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge
-Modernista Apartment kitchens with stainless steel appliances available
-Garage and parking lot available
-Professional on-site management team
-Listed on the National Historic Register
-On site washer and dryer
-Elevator building
-Beautiful courtyards
-Spacious floor plans with large bedrooms and closets
-This is a cat friendly community

title: Beautiful 2BR/1BA in desirable Location Spruce Hill/University City
description:
Beautiful 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment ( 2BR/1BA)apartment on 2nd floor in desirable location in Spruce Hill/University City. The unit has new central heat and A/C with 93% high energy efficiency Lenox brand; New kitchen cabinets/granite counter top with new dish washer. New bathroom with new vanity and tile shower.  Newer flooring and newer windows. The layout of the unit makes it easier to share.  The front porch is shared by every tenant in the building.
Coin-operated laundry in basement.
Walking distance to University of Pennsylvania ( Upenn), Hospital of University of Pennsylvania ( HUP) Children's Hospital of Philadelphia ( CHOP) , University of Pennsylvania Veterinary School and University of Science (USP). Conveniently located close to 42 bus, the 34 trolley and the 13 trolley (this trolley runs 24/7). Less than 5 minutes walk to 24 hour CVS, Local 44, Milk & Honey, Green Line Cafe, and many other restaurants/coffee shops! The neighborhood is served by Penn and University City District security guards and is on the Penn bus/shuttle route.
Tenant pays electricity and gas. Cold water included .
Available 8/1/22 for a 1-year lease. Prospective tenants must be credit worthy, with income/co-signer and good references. E-mail with questions/set up a viewing.
